languages.text: "А мне ее ни чуточки не жалко! Всем известно, что лицо портится лишь на том, чьи помыслы нечисты, а душа — порочна!"
"Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"
languages.original_text: "А мне ее ни чуточки не жалко! Всем известно, что лицо портится лишь на том, чьи помыслы нечисты, а душа — порочна!"

traits.locale_text: "Me, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everybody knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"
"Me, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everybody knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

"Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

languages.text: 「まあ。私はちっとも気の毒だなんて思わないけどね！思考が不浄で、魂が悪徳に満ちていなければ、顔がただれるわけがないって、みんな知ってるでしょ！」
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: 「まあ。私はちっとも気の毒だなんて思わないけどね！思考が不浄で、魂が悪徳に満ちていなければ、顔がただれるわけがないって、みんな知ってるでしょ！」

languages.text: "Bir gram bile üzülmedim doğrusu! Ancak fesat fikirleri ve şer dolu bir ruhu olanların yüzü o hâle gelir, bunu da herkes bilir!"
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir gram bile üzülmedim doğrusu! Ancak fesat fikirleri ve şer dolu bir ruhu olanların yüzü o hâle gelir, bunu da herkes bilir!"

languages.text: «¡A mí no me da ninguna lástima! ¡Todo el mundo sabe que la cara no cambia a menos que tus pensamientos sean impuros y el vicio consuma tu alma!».
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A mí no me da ninguna lástima! ¡Todo el mundo sabe que la cara no cambia a menos que tus pensamientos sean impuros y el vicio consuma tu alma!».

languages.text: “是嘛，可我一点都不同情她！众所周知，脸是不会无缘无故烂掉的，除非你的思想不再纯洁，你的灵魂充满了罪恶！”
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: “是嘛，可我一点都不同情她！众所周知，脸是不会无缘无故烂掉的，除非你的思想不再纯洁，你的灵魂充满了罪恶！”

languages.text: « Bien fait pour elle ! Tout le monde sait qu'une telle dégénérescence est le symptôme révélateur d'une âme pétrie de vices et de pensées impures ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien fait pour elle ! Tout le monde sait qu'une telle dégénérescence est le symptôme révélateur d'une âme pétrie de vices et de pensées impures ! »

languages.text: "Tja, mir tut sie kein bisschen leid. Jeder weiß, dass dein Gesicht nur leidet, wenn deine Gedanken unrein und deine Seele voller Sünde ist!"
languages.original_text: "Well, I don't feel sorry for her in the slightest! Everyone knows your face doesn't go bad unless your thoughts are impure and your soul is full of vice!"

traits.locale_text: "Tja, mir tut sie kein bisschen leid. Jeder weiß, dass dein Gesicht nur leidet, wenn deine Gedanken unrein und deine Seele voller Sünde ist!"
